title: Honor Teases its Upcoming 400 Series Phones
description: The phones go live on 22nd May. The post Honor Teases its Upcoming 400 Series Phones appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: The phones go live on 22nd May.
text: While it’s been some time now since the launch of its Magic 7 flagship, it looks like Honor is once again gearing up for a new smartphone launch, which consists of new additions to its 400 series, the first of which was the 400 Lite. Honor hasn’t revealed much info yet (quite understandably), but thathasn’t stopped the brand from teasing its new device. READ: HONOR’s New Porsche-styled Magic7 RSR Adds a bit of “Oomph” to its Design As such, the Honor 400 series will feature a 200MP main camera, which the company says has been enhanced with AI-enhanced editing and imaging capabilities. The new devices will also feature a more premium approach to design, as shown in the teaser video below: https://phandroid.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/05/honor-400-launch-teaser-1.mp4 As for the rest of the hardware specs (as well as details such as pricing), fans will have to tune into Honor’s big launch event, which is scheduled to go live on May 22.
